io.vertx.ext.auth.oauth2

Class OAuth2ClientOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.net.NetworkOptions
      • io.vertx.core.net.TCPSSLOptions
        • io.vertx.core.net.ClientOptionsBase
          • io.vertx.core.http.HttpClientOptions
            • io.vertx.ext.auth.oauth2.OAuth2ClientOptions

  • public class OAuth2ClientOptions
extends HttpClientOptions
    Options describing how an OAuth2 HttpClient will make connections.
    Author:
    Paulo Lopes
